scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn
scripts.run-android-prd: cd ./android && gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.run-android-prd-bundle: cd ./android && gradlew bundleRelease && gradlew assembleRelease && cd ../ && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.run-android-prd-stackoverflow: cd ./android && gradlew assembleRelease -x bundleReleaseJsAndAssets && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.fastlane-android: cd android && bundle exec fastlane android build && cd ..
scripts.fastlane-ios: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane ios build && cd ..
scripts.clean-pods: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod cache clean --all && pod install && cd ..
